gift_idea.title: 3D Cake Moulds
gift_idea.description: Bake your cakes to another dimension with these wonderfully squat 3D Cake Moulds – they're the rugged blank baking canvases the world has been crying out for.

gift_idea.title: Ninja Plush
gift_idea.description: They may look like big softies but Ninja Plush are in fact highly disciplined and ruthless assassins. Well... sort of. Trained in all manner of ancient techniques from ‘Stealth Hugs’ to the vicious ‘Nubs of Tickle Fury’ (or so we’re told) they’re not to be trifled with. Then again, at only 9” tall they’re probably not even a match for a stiff breeze.

gift_idea.title: The Simpsons Egg Cup
gift_idea.description: Remove the top of Homer's head and place the boiled egg inside the egg cup, you will see the egg makes a perfect replacement. Speech bubbles containing some of Homer's famous catchphrases can then be created from toast using the combined toast stamp and cutter.

gift_idea.title: Peanut Butter Maker by Nostalgia Electrics
gift_idea.description: Make delicious home made, natural peanut butter at home. The Nostalgia Electrics NBM400 Electric Nut Butter Maker makes it quick and easy to create a wide range of nut butters. Simply pour your favourite nuts in the container, switch the unit on, add some oil and the machine will make fresh nut butter.

gift_idea.title: Wireless Showerhead Speaker
gift_idea.description: Surround yourself with sound for a new kind of shower experience. Your music. Your shower. Your time. To shine. To chill out. To sing. To refresh. To re-set. To be moved. To get energized. To get away. The showerhead +bluetooth wireless speaker delivers 11.5 hours of music, news and more to your showerhead by pairing wirelessly with your Bluetooth- enabled devices.

gift_idea.title: Retro Lips Phone
gift_idea.description: Cool & Kitsch! This bright red phone in the shape of lips could be that functional finishing touch you have been looking for!

gift_idea.title: Watermelon Shark Server
gift_idea.description: Add some jaw-dropping, focus-grabbing fun to your buffet table with this whimsical ceramic shark server. Crafted of Dolomite with the look of carved watermelon, it's perfect for melon balls, other fruit and veggies.

gift_idea.title: Led Cube Alarm Clock
gift_idea.description: Time can be smart, clever, ultra-stylish, functional and simple with this cube black wooden alarm clock. This cube black alarm clock can tell you the time, date and temperature alternately in green LED colour on a black wood-effect block at the click of your fingers and automatically switches off when the room is quiet, lighting up again when the alarm goes off or as a response to clicked fingers or clapped hands. The numbers seem to float on the lovely wooden block, but that's just half the magic of this cubiod with a conscience.

gift_idea.title: The Living Cube
gift_idea.description: Living Cube will be available for sale starting Jan 1st, 2014....

gift_idea.title: Retro Tv iPad Frame
gift_idea.description:
This original gift for iPad owners and TV fans is beautifully crafted in solid oak.

The Retro TV iPad frame is a quirky, nostalgic design and will be the envy of any gadget lover. The chunky solid oak sleeve is a mutli-functional piece. It holds your iPad and allows you to view your favourite online entertainment, it can also be used as an ipad photo frame or it can simply be a safe place to store your iPad.

This iPad frame would be the perfect accompanying gift for anyone receiving an iPad this Christmas and for anyone who already owns an iPad.

It has two keyholes neatly cut from the back, allowing the frame to be completely wall mountable, but it also works as a free standing frame, on a mantlepiece for example.

Currently available for the ipad 2.

gift_idea.title: World's Hottest Chilli Powders
gift_idea.description:
Sometimes less is more. That’s definitely the case when it comes to chili powder. Who needs big bottles when a little vial will do? The world’s hottest flavours now fit into a handy matchbook. Slip it in your pocket and bring with you to restaurants, friends’ houses, or anywhere you need an extra dose of spicy.
This little but explosive box includes current world champion Scorpion Moruga, a former world hottest Butch T, the legendary 7 Pot, and the ten minute burner Ghost powder. Each one is beautifully presented in a corked glass bottle. 
The box also includes four fun chilli fact cards and a limited edition super hot collector's card. This all comes perfectly packaged in a standard sized matchbox.

gift_idea.title: Muffintop Cupcake Case
gift_idea.description:
We've all seen this look before, but not like this!

Fill these adorable jean-style cupcake cases with your favorite cake mix. As the Muffin Tops bake, they will develop that little extra bulge around the middle!

Eat up, it's just more to love. Each set includes 4 cupcake moulds. 100% food-grade silicone.

Presented in a colourful giftbox along with baking tips, these make the perfect gift ready to give or keep for yourself!

gift_idea.title: Football Table
gift_idea.description: These table are entirely hand-made out of reclaimed wood, using natural products and eco-friendly processes.

gift_idea.title: Smartphone Camera Remote
gift_idea.description:
Mobile phone cameras have turned us all into a shameless bunch of vain, self-portrait taking wretches. But there's nothing wrong with loving taking pictures of yourself. 

The problem is, turning your phone around and using a mirror to line up your strained smiling face is not exactly practical. It usually results in about 30 unusable photos of your forearm surrounded by bathroom shelves. Don't even pretend that front-facing cameras fully eradicate these obstacles. 

The solution to the perfect selfie is as simple as you'd expect - it's the Smartphone Camera Remote and it does exactly what you think it does. Just download the free app and it'll automatically sync to the remote, then when you've got your facial muscles under control/got yer sultry duck-face on – simply press the button to trigger the shutter.

gift_idea.title: Hi-Reflective Umbrella
gift_idea.description: Upon first sight this innocent looking umbrella appears to be a simple stylish grey umbrella, however upon closer inspection you will see that the material used is brightly reflective to help keep you seen at night. The Hi-Reflective Umbrella is made from fabric that's coated with tiny reflective beads that give it a subtle glittery sheen in the daytime, but when a light such as a streetlight of car headlight hits it at night, the light bounces off to give a super bright reflection which means that you will always be seen at night and in low light conditions.

gift_idea.title: Stamp Cookie Cutter
gift_idea.description:
Make an impression with these fun and quirky cookie cutters and stamps!

Easy as pie!

Roll out your cookie or biscuit dough and use the cutter to create your shape before gently pressing down on the retractable 'Eat Me' or 'Home Made' stamp.

gift_idea.title: LOL Tote Bag
gift_idea.description:
LOL, a bold typographic tote from Alphabet Bags.

LOL, an abbreviation of laughing out loud. Love it or hate it LOL has been cemented in our lives as a common form of internet slang. The abbreviation has also been used historically in letter writing to convey lots of luck or lots of love.

gift_idea.title: Deluxe High Ropes Adventure
gift_idea.description:
Swing from tree to tree high above the forest floor for over two hours of adrenalin-fuelled fun, laughter and adventure. This high ropes course is built in some of the tallest trees in Eastern England in the beautiful New Wood, part of Weasenham Woods in Norfolk. This experience takes aerial trekking to new extremes as you swing, climb and jump through the trees.

Wearing a safety harness, participants trek through the canopy across 20 different activities amongst trees as tall as 150ft. The course is a network of rope bridges, trapezes and death slides that offers an exhilarating, challenging experience, which will leave you gasping for more! The course is set at two different heights: low ropes at 20ft and high ropes at 40ft for the more extreme participant.

gift_idea.title: Hidden Message Mittens
gift_idea.description: They seem like any ordinary pair of mittens until you show people the heart or snowflake in the palm of your hands or the little smiley thumbs that are sure to put a smile on any sad face you come accross.

gift_idea.title: Guitar Pendant by Joy Everley
gift_idea.description:
What to give a musician, music fan, festival goer or party lover? A miniature silver guitar on a chain! This necklace can be worn by men or women.

The detailed, three dimensional, solid silver guitar is 20mm long and hangs on a 51cm fine but strong curb chain. On the back of the guitar you will find the tiny 'Joy' logo and a full British Sterling Silver hallmark.

gift_idea.title: Food Huggers
gift_idea.description: Food Huggers preserve your leftover fruits and veggies with a tight seal. Keeps your food fresher longer. Save food & save money!

gift_idea.title: All-Weather Notebook
gift_idea.description: Outdoorsy types are always ready to head out for a walk or hike no matter the weather. Something like a little rain, sand or damp doesn’t deter them. But it can deter list making and note taking. The Rite in the Rain All Weather Notebook means that you can write away, right away, no matter what’s going on around you. No tearing, smudging, or crumpling. When using Rite in the Rain paper, it’s always a sunny day.

gift_idea.title: 360 Degree Desktop Fan
gift_idea.description: This fan attracts attention with his elegant appearance. It has a powerful and quiet motor with high-quality bearings and creates a big breeze without rustling the paperwork beneath it.

gift_idea.title: Chalkboard World Map Wall Sticker
gift_idea.description: This stunning Chalkboard World Map wall sticker is perfect for jetsetters and travel enthusiasts. Simply plan your next world trip by jotting down your favourite destinations with chalk, then wipe clean with a cloth when you get home! With two size options (choose from regular and large to suit your space) this wall sticker is ideal for all rooms of the house and our special chalkboard vinyl is both stylish and functional, allowing you to scribble important notes and memos whilst adding a bold, modern finish to your room.

gift_idea.title: Vertical Chess Set
gift_idea.description: This is a vertical chess board that hangs on the wall like Art, but is designed to play a casual game of chess. Make your move, mark it "Last Move" and go on your way. The chess pieces sit on the narrow acrylic shelves. Chess pieces and markers for "Last Move" and "Check" are included.

gift_idea.title: Sunnyside Egg Mold
gift_idea.description: An adorable egg mould! Sunnyside is by far the cutest way to eat an egg! Simply pop the egg white into the cloud area and then the yolk into the sun and there you have it! Quite literally, sunshine on a plate!

gift_idea.title: Assault & Pepper Shakers
gift_idea.description: These cute little fellows make sure meal times get a little bit tasty, but watch out as the salt packs quite a punch and sadly for poor pepper he is on the receiving end of it! If your dinner table is looking a little bit bland then these two shakers are the perfect addition to make it a little edgy.

gift_idea.title: Heart Umbrella
gift_idea.description: Heart shaped umbrella featuring a windproof lightweight frame, aluminum shaft, UV protection coated canopy, and an ergonomically designed color matching rubber handle. A perfect birthday or anniversary gift for that special someone in your life.

gift_idea.title: Super Awesome Sweatshirt
gift_idea.description: A sweatshirt featuring a metallic "Super Awesome" graphic. Round neckline. Drop shoulders. Long sleeves. Ribbed trim. Knit. Lightweight.

gift_idea.title: Vintage Laptop Case
gift_idea.description:
Twelve South BookBook Leather Case for 15 inch MacBook Pro Retina.
BookBook is a totally unique case for the thinnest of MacBooks. Weighing as little as 13.5 ounces with an ultra-thin profile, this handmade, genuine leather case offers heavy duty protection. Two hardback covers, reinforced corners and a cushioned spine offer solid impact protection. The inside of the case is lined with a velvety soft, chocolate brown, padded interior for added protection.

gift_idea.title: Chef's Tablet Stand with Touch Pen
gift_idea.description: The stand for creative chefs. If you use a tablet for recipes, you’ll know just how messy they can get when you’re in full cooking flow. Keep it clean in the kitchen with this stand and stylus combo – it’ll support your device and the stylus will ensure you won’t need to use your hands, keeping your tablet free from flour and other ingredients.

gift_idea.title: Touch Screen Gloves
gift_idea.description: The touch screen gloves are ideal for operating touch sensitive devices like the iPad, iPod Touch and smartphones. If you have ever tried to operate a touch screen with normal gloves you will know it is impossible to control. So, if you have a cold snap or you regularly have to operate your device in cold temperatures where you need to wear gloves then these innovative gloves are the perfect solution.

gift_idea.title: Real Boy Pins
gift_idea.description: It's just as well these little guys lie so much, because it means you can use their noses to decorate your walls and hold your stuff to pinboards.

gift_idea.title: Jukebox Dock Bluetooth
gift_idea.description: Compatible with all your Bluetooth gadgets, simply pop one in the universal cradle at the front and you'll be able to enjoy excellent stereo sound and charge you device at the same time. If you’re still yet to embrace the wonders of wireless technology then you can easily connect your music source via the included 3.5mm input cable.

gift_idea.title: Hunter Wellies Rain Boots Aubergine
gift_idea.description: Great Shoes!

gift_idea.title: Striped Bowl Bamboo
gift_idea.description: This makes an exceptionally elegant bread basket or fruit bowl. It’s equally spectacular as a handsome centrepiece on your dining or living room table. The sculptured spiral shape and the expressive play of finely striped colours make this gigantic bowl look like a valuable piece of modern art.

gift_idea.title: Pixel Sunglasses
gift_idea.description: Like looking through a really old graphics processor, these stylish frames feature an angular ‘pixel’ design and offer 100% UV protection.

gift_idea.title: Nostalgia Electrics Red Retro Series Window Toaster
gift_idea.description: This Nostalgia Electrics Retro Series Window Toaster has a revolutionary, lever-free design that lowers and raises toast with the push of a button. Also, you can watch your bread and bagels brown to perfection through the windows on the sides of the unit. It has two slots for toasting bread, buns, bagels and more. With the Nostalgia Electrics Window Toaster, making toast has never been more fun.

gift_idea.title: Halloween Cake Pop Kit
gift_idea.description:
Make your own delightful Halloween Cake Pops. 12 delicious balls of chocolate cake on a stick coated in chocolate with hand piped Halloween faces.

The perfect Halloween activity to keep the kids amused over the half-term holiday.

gift_idea.title: Nike Roshe Run
gift_idea.description: The Nike Roshe Run Mid Shoe features a popular mid-cut profile with breathable mesh throughout the upper to maximise airflow. Lightweight cushioning and a durable outsole offer incredible comfort. The shoe is intended to be versatile, worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.

gift_idea.title: Halloween Handmade Witches Sign
gift_idea.description: Leave your brooms at the door handmade Halloween sign. Painted in layers of pumpkin orange with black distressed edges this sign is a fun addition to your Halloween decor.

gift_idea.title: Airplane Doorstop
gift_idea.description: A playful plastic "paper plane" doorstopper wedge. This playful plastic "paper plane" door stopper will add a little cheer to any room in the house.

gift_idea.title: LED Glow Chess Set
gift_idea.description: These LED Chess sets are truly unique. The chess pieces light up with no batteries when they are on or near the board!

gift_idea.title: The Zipper Bookmark
gift_idea.description: This zipper is bound to open your book on the right page!

gift_idea.title: Book Rest Lamp
gift_idea.description:
Whilst you're all tucked up in bed reading your favourite fairy-tale, horror story, glamour model biography you can read to the glow of this clever and uncomplicated lamp. Made of frosted glass it gives off a soft light, ideal to read to but also doubles as a book rest ensuring you never lose your page. But this is no ordinary run-of-the-mill book stand, sit your favourite book on top of the lamp and look! You've made a house! It's just one of those simple design gems that makes you feel all warm and fuzzy inside.

Move your mouse over the lamp to switch on and off!

gift_idea.title: Pac Man Ghost Lamp
gift_idea.description:
Remote controlled Pac Man Ghost Lamp with 16 different colour modes. 
Options include: Flash, Strobe, Fade and Smooth, On/Off/Dimmer.

gift_idea.title: Doosh Shower Head - No Wet Hair
gift_idea.description: Would you like to shower in comfort without getting your hair wet? No problem at all with the revolutionary new shower head from Butlers and German celebrity Stefan Raab. At perfect shoulder height, a broad water flow from 204 spray nozzles ensures a refreshing and invigorating spa shower experience with maximum body coverage– whilst keeping your hair dry.

gift_idea.title: Yellow Submarine Tea Infuser
gift_idea.description: The Yellow Submarine Tea Infuser makes the perfect brew. Inspired by the iconic Beatles film, this novelty tea infuser is made from food safe silicone, is dishwasher safe and so easy to use. Simply open the sub, fill it with your favourite loose leaf tea blend, fill your cup with boiling water and then simply submerge to the bottom of your cup and let it complete it`s mission...

gift_idea.title: Pumpkin Teeth
gift_idea.description: Pumpkin Teeth are long white plastic teeth that you can embed into your pumpkin (or gourd, melon, whatever you want!) They come in 3 sizes and can be re-used, making every Halloween just a little bit spookier! Decorating your pumpkin has never been so creepy!

gift_idea.title: GingerDead Man Cookie Cutter
gift_idea.description: If you hear a spooky crumbling sound from the kitchen in the middle of the night, beware! It just might be the restless, sugar-overloaded spirit of the Gingerdead Man. Make no bones about it - you've never seen cookies like these. Your only defense is to eat them before they eat you!

gift_idea.title: Buddha Peace Money Bank in Pink
gift_idea.description: Give yourself some financial 'peace' of mind with this Buddha money bank; featuring a cash slot to the back and an opening to the base.

gift_idea.title: Genuine Doomed Crystal Skull Shot Glass
gift_idea.description: This formidable shot glass by Fred and Friend's is atribute to the Skull of Doom, which Mayan legend claims has the power of life and death, the power to heal or to smite, the power to create miracles. Hand-blown crystal-clear borosilicate glass.

gift_idea.title: Paperback for iPhone
gift_idea.description: Take notes on your phone. Designed for use with iPhone 5, 5s, and 5c. 80 sheets per pad.

gift_idea.title: Dior Vernis Nail Polish Trafalgar 657
gift_idea.description: Adding the final touch to finger nails, Dior Vernis nail polish combines lacquered shine with impeccable hold. A cocktail of shine and sparkle amplifying active ingredients directs pigments and pearly particles to enhance light reflection tenfold.

gift_idea.title: Ben & Jerry's Combination Lock
gift_idea.description: Keep away “Vermonsters”! “Clever cookies” have no chance getting into your favourite pint with this combination lock. It’s one idea that’s definitely not “half baked.” But watch out for hangers on trying to “peanut butter you up” for a small spoonful. With three numbers to catch on to, the thieves won’t even have a chance to ask for “s’mores”.

gift_idea.title: Checkers Shot Glass Bar Game Set
gift_idea.description: Stylishly designed shot glass chess set and board. Each of the 32 shot glasses has an image on its side to denote which piece it represents. Use it for a normal chess match or add your favourite tipple for a drinking game twist.

gift_idea.title: Nike Air Pegasus 83/30 “Mineral Teal”
gift_idea.description: For Autumn/Winter 2013 and graciously falling on the 30th anniversary of the Air Pegasus, Nike present this updated version to the Pegasus family. It is shown here utilising a Hyperfuse upper with mesh underlays.

gift_idea.title: Glowing Bike
gift_idea.description: Get ready to take your night riding to a whole new level on the Pure Fix GLOW in the Dark fixie bike. The bike's paint is solar-activated; just give your bike an hour of daytime sun for an hour or more of night-time fun. Whether you're a night owl, a raver, or just want to trip out your friends this is the bike for you.

gift_idea.title: Glass Half Pint Milk Carton
gift_idea.description: Half Pint is an artfully blown and molded glass creamer that captures the comforting familiarity of a mini milk carton.

gift_idea.title: Pinhead for iPhone or iPod
gift_idea.description: Your iPhone or iPod will stand proudly on its own feed whilst charging. Compatible with iPhone 3, 3GS, 4, 4S, iPod Nano and iPod Touch.

gift_idea.title: Dancing Splash Water Fountain Speakers
gift_idea.description: Make a real splash at your next party and wow your guests or enjoy a visual arts treat along with your music with the brilliant and colourful Dancing Splash Water Fountain LED Speakers. These high quality speakers produce bass thumping and clear music streamed directly from your music output; any smartphone/laptop/computer/ipod/MP3 player connected to the speakers via a 3.5mm jack (cable provided) while displaying an amazing and truly unique water fountain. Watch in amazement as the dancing water fountain dances away in sync with your music and watch as the higher your volume goes, the higher the dancing water flows. These compact and portable speakers are powered by a USB connection. Music may be for the ears but now thanks to CaseGuru music is also for the eyes, listen and watch a breath-taking visual display right in the comfort of your own surroundings with the The Dancing Splash Water Fountain LED Speakers with Black USB Mains Charger.

gift_idea.title: Float Magazine Rack
gift_idea.description: This fantastic floating magazine rack is a stylish and clever solution to your magazine storage problems. Constructed from chrome, the rack features thin bars for you to slot your magazines onto, no more crumpled and bent magazines in a traditional magazine rack, this floating rack will keep your magazines neatly organised and stylishly presented. You will have no more trouble trying to find the TV guide! This magazine rack will hold up to 12 magazines.

gift_idea.title: Monkey Chimpsticks by Fred
gift_idea.description: Fred Chimp Sticks These cheeky chimp sticks are fun to hold and easy to use. You will feel like your eating with your hands.

gift_idea.title: Edible Spray Paint
gift_idea.description: Now you can have blue strawberries, silver muffins or a golden chicken. With "Esslack".

gift_idea.title: White Marilyn Manson Style Contact Lenses
gift_idea.description:
You better don't open your eyes if you don't want your friends to run away.
These classic Manson Contact Lenses with their white inner glow and black outer edge are great for recreating that gothic look so popular at Halloween.

gift_idea.title: 'Enter If You Dare' Luminaries
gift_idea.description: Put the neighbors on notice with giant Enter If You Dare Luminaries.

gift_idea.title: Beats by Dr Dre Colorware Silver
gift_idea.description: Perhaps you've already seen your favorite NBA player sporting a custom made set of Beats by Dr. Dre. Well, they got it from ColorWare. You can now get a set of your very own.

gift_idea.title: Aqua Orb
gift_idea.description: Now you can walk on water without getting wet.

gift_idea.title: Superman Ice Cube Tray
gift_idea.description: It’s a bird, it’s a plane, it’s Superman! You can indulge your inner superhero by pulling on red tights and a cape. Or you can instead fill up this Superman silicon ice cube tray. The S-shield ice cubes will give even the weakest drinks super powers.

gift_idea.title: Color Wheel Umbrella
gift_idea.description: Rain, rain, go away. Come again another day. Actually this rainbow bright umbrella may have you wishing for the clouds to stay. Big enough for two to cuddle up during the fiercest of storms, the colour wheel umbrella will keep you dry until the sun comes out to play.

gift_idea.title: Backyard Hockey Rink
gift_idea.description: Set up a hockey or skating rink in your backyard. Simply pour 2 inches of water within the frame and allow 48 hours to freeze.

gift_idea.title: Sweet Spirits Cookie Cutters 4 (Set of 4)
gift_idea.description: Mexican tradition encourages a healthy respect for relatives that have passed on to their final reward, especially on the Day of the Dead, when the deceased are honored with sweet treats like sugar skulls!

gift_idea.title: DNA Bookcase
gift_idea.description: The DNA bookcase is an unconventional bookcase with spiralling shelves. It has a twisted form with the 13 shelves positioned at different angles and each can easily hold DVDs, CDs, books and other items. It is constructed completely from steel and has a white or black painted steel finish.

gift_idea.title: Bakeball Rolling Pin
gift_idea.description: Rolling pins for baseball fans. The perfect gift for someone who loves sports and baking as well.

gift_idea.title: Skull Stuff Tidy
gift_idea.description: Keep your essentials in your head Keys, glasses, phone, watch, loose change, and the contents of your pockets... it can be difficult keeping all these things in mind. Get organised, keep your paraphernalia in a skull, freeing up space in yours. The key to good organisation is to keep everything in one place, so stay tidy, fill your head with stuff before you lose it. Designed for holding the things you use every day.

gift_idea.title: A La Carte table
gift_idea.description: A novel table made from gigantic playing cards can be used for playing games on or as a side table.

gift_idea.title: Keep Calm Navy Duvet Cover Set
gift_idea.description:
Keep Calm It's Time For Bed.
Navy Duvet Cover Set.

gift_idea.title: Stress Paul Stress Ball
gift_idea.description: Feeling overwhelmed – tense – under pressure? Frustrated at work? Computer keep crashing? Don't let it get to you – take it out on poor old Paul! He's there for all your stress–busting needs. Keep him on your desk, in your pocket or tucked in your handbag.

gift_idea.title: Illuminated Globes
gift_idea.description:
This contemporary illuminated Stem "Reflection" Globe has a metal stand which is finished in chrome for a striking appearance.

The globe is illuminated using a discrete foot operated switch.

gift_idea.title: Twin Seat Jetpack
gift_idea.description:
"Stop Dreaming! Start Flying!"

This special jetpack allows the pilot to take a passenger with him.
Perfect for family, rental and training issues.
Enjoy flight thrills together!

gift_idea.title: Star Wars USB Stick
gift_idea.description:
Memory stick with cult appeal: 8 licenced original Star Wars characters with USB stick.
Keychain pendants, collector’s items …? Nobody would guess the true function of these whimsical cult characters from what is probably the most successful sci-fi series of all time. Simply remove the helmet or head, and your favourite character morphs into an 8GB USB stick. With enough storage space for approx. 144,000 pages of text, over 1,000 pictures, MP3 files or for up to 3 hours of video.

gift_idea.title: Kitchen Kong Whisk
gift_idea.description: Fred and Friends Kitchen King - a Highly-Evolved Whisk. It's a well-documented fact that gorillas love to cook and this little guy has actually taken up residence in a whisk just so he can be part of the action! It's the highly evolved kitchen necessity! Made of metal and silicone - food safe Dishwasher safe.

gift_idea.title: Lock Pick Cufflinks
gift_idea.description: Upon first glance, The Sparrows UNCUFF LINK appears to be a standard pair of cuff links. However, a covert, hidden handcuff key has been engineered in to the design. This concealed hand cuff key will to open almost all Standard Hand cuffs. It’s also designed to hold your French Cuffs closed. A must have for any international SPY or the average citizen looking for some styling carbon fiber inlaid cuff links that happen to open Hand cuffs.

gift_idea.title: Snack Bowl
gift_idea.description:
A beautiful ambient storm lantern and illuminated snack bowl in one.
The novel way to serve evening snacks such as biscuits, nuts, or olives: Stylish, appetising, and especially easy to see. The large tealight inside the clear glass cylinder is protected from the wind and will burn safely. Its subtle glow is gently reflected by the shiny chrome shade and illuminates the snacks in the bowl.

gift_idea.title: Edible Eyes
gift_idea.description: Eyes you can eat. Stick them on your food to turn a sensible snack into a fun snack. Surprise your kids, give their packed lunch apple some personality. Stick them to your dinner and give your carrots a face. Make eye contact with your cupcakes right before you swallow them in front of their friends. Ten different expressions per pack. Delicious.

gift_idea.title: Gone Fishin’ Flatware
gift_idea.description: Gone Fishin' Buffet Spreaders (set of 4) are a stylish way to entertain your guests or yourself. A house at the beach, on the lake or in the mountains will become that much better when the table is set with this beautiful design. Crafted of carefree stainless steel for years of enjoyment. Suited for buffet tables as well as patio dining. A great hostess gift or keep them for your own use. 5" In Length. Dishwasher safe.

gift_idea.title: Brain Freeze Ice Cube Tray
gift_idea.description: Some great novelty pink ice cube trays with a difference from Fred. These trays allow you to create Brain ice cube shapes which are sure to liven up any drink, and put a whole new spin on the saying brain freeze! Brilliant for special occasions and parties, each tray makes 4 large ice cubes and is re-usable. Made by Fred.

gift_idea.title: Come In, Go Away Door Mat
gift_idea.description: Made from all natural materials (coconut husks), this mind boggling doormat reads differently depending on whether you are walking in or out of the house. It's got to be seen to be believed but from one side reads "Come In" and from the other "Go Away". And when you have finished marvelling at this remarkable feat of graphic design you can wipe the mud from your boots too!!

gift_idea.title: Astronaut Duvet
gift_idea.description: Sure to orbit your child into a deep sleep this fun and stylish duvet from SNURK is a great way to dress up your child's room and encourage imaginative play. The set includes the duvet with a space suit printed on it as well as the pillow which is made of the space helmet, so maybe they will actually want to make their bed to see the whole look put together.

gift_idea.title: Lolly Pop Men Ice Lolly Mould
gift_idea.description: Lolly sticks. Boring aren’t they? Why not turn them into little animated figures with lollipop heads?

gift_idea.title: Hollister Break Line Cologne
gift_idea.description: Rugged with a genuine SoCal attitude, Break Line Cologne is a tribute to Hollister's classic beach heritage. Invigorating saltwater and mandarin breaks into clary sage, driftwood and warm sand.

gift_idea.title: Voodoo Doll Cookie Cutter
gift_idea.description: It's been quite a while since anyone has seen a zombie, that is, a real walking living undead creature. Nobody gives a damn for voodoo anymore, except as a cookie cutting idea. Yes! Now you can cut your cookie to resemble a voodoo doll. Cursed Cookie punches the shape on one side and stamps the detail on the other. And hey presto you have a voodoo doll cookie into which you can stick all manner of sharp objects. Have your revenge and eat it too! These bizarre looking cookies are sure to grab the attention of your friends or your children who are bound to come around asking for more. Don't be bored any longer baking the same old cookies!. Get yourself this snazzy little cookie cutter and liven things up at home!

gift_idea.title: Nike Air Max 1 Essential
gift_idea.description: Nike Womens Air Max 1 Essential Trainers in Yellow, Grey and White. These ultra-comfortable trainers feature a feminine colourway to upper and soft cushioning via the padded collar and visible air unit. Iconic branding to sides, tongue and heel.

gift_idea.title: Colour Changing Umbrella
gift_idea.description: These colour changing umbrellas come printed with special ink, white when dry, that comes to life when in contact with water. Why would you buy a normal umbrella again? At best you will look cool, at worst you will confuse a generation of children into thinking rainbows are leaking colour from the sky.

gift_idea.title: Mr P Kiss Mug
gift_idea.description: Tea or coffee breaks will be all the more stylish with this ceramic Mr. P mug!

gift_idea.title: Playing Cards With Design
gift_idea.description: Playing Cards with beautiful Vintage Design. Great for any Magic Trick lovers or card game enthusiasts you may know!

gift_idea.title: Patterned Paint Roller
gift_idea.description:
Spring Bird Design

Patterned Paint Rollers create a beautiful stencil like design on walls, wood, furniture, fabric, paper and more!

Paint directly on walls in your choice of color paint! Get a beautiful wallpapered look with the ease of paint!

Create a modern unique look to furniture! Dress up headboards or dressers! Even paint your floors!

Mix patterns for a creative design look

Washes easily for cleanup

6" inches in width 

Complete instructions and design ideas are included

Both the patterned roller and the applicator are included in this set. 

Don't be intimidated YOU can create beautiful professional looking walls with our materials and complete instructional video link and design & help blog.

gift_idea.title: Robot Nut Cracker
gift_idea.description: In the future robots will fulfil all manner of helpful tasks around the home… the future has arrived with these vintage looking wind-up robots whose specialist task is to crack open nuts.

gift_idea.title: Walk Bathroom Mat
gift_idea.description: Slippers are integrated into the mat, allowing you to walk comfortably and without slipping on dirty or wet floors. At the same time, Mat walk can be seen as a new way of wiping the bathroom floor.

gift_idea.title: Wine Glass Oil & Vinegar Set
gift_idea.description: The Ming Oil & Vinegar Set from Dutch design firm Jansen + Co. takes the classic form of the wine glass and turns it on its head, literally. It’s clever – the stem reduces the flow just the right amount, so it’s easy to measure as you pour.

gift_idea.title: Nike Woven
gift_idea.description: A uniquely constructed upper and plush feel define the Nike Roshe Run Woven Women's Shoe, inspired by the lightweight comfort and sharp look of a classic running shoe. The shoe is intended to be versatile, worn with or without socks, dressed up or down, for walking or just taking it easy.

gift_idea.title: Balloon Ceiling Light
gift_idea.description:
A unique balloon light suitable for ceiling use.

Memory Balloon is a light inspired by memories of childhood, and is perfect for a child's room, nursery or anyone with a sense of fun!

gift_idea.title: Boa Decanter
gift_idea.description: Chinese Calendar 2013 = the year of the Snake, this sleek decanter takes Riedel’s elegant serpentine vessels in a new design direction. Consisting entirely of tight coils, the Boa double-decants, “opening up” wine in mere seconds.

gift_idea.title: Snoopy Hot Water Bottle
gift_idea.description:
There’s nothing as warm and cuddly as Snoopy. Must-have cuddly soft animal toys and hot water bottles in one.
Cold feet, a stiff neck, feeling homesick, or a tummy ache: Snoopy can banish them all. The cuddly cartoon characters warm body and soul, ease tension, and are tireless comforting friends. If you remove the hot water bottle, they become favourite bedtime companions, also perfect as a snugly travel pillow.

gift_idea.title: Kiss My Airs Tote Bag
gift_idea.description: For all those people out there who love Nike Air Max.

gift_idea.title: Juicy Salif Citrus Squeezer
gift_idea.description: Alberto Alessi was surprised and intrigued when he received the design for this lemon juicer from Philippe Starck. Not because the design was exceptional, but because he had asked Starck to design him a tray! The juicer has gone on to achieve iconic status in the design world. An intelligently designed citrus juicer by Phillipe Starck for Alessi. Just the right height to be used comfortably - press, turn and squeeze - the lemon juice will quickly collect in a glass placed underneath the Salif. Easy to clean - run it under a warm tap straight away - that's all you need to do. Such a nice design - it really shouldn't be hidden away in the cupboard. Nicely gift boxed.The Alessi Juicy Salif is made from cast alloy and is 29cm high by 14cm diameter.

gift_idea.title: Ketchup & Mustard Crayums
gift_idea.description:
Get creative with your condiments! Decorate your hot dog or add some frills to your fries... you'll end up with a masterpiece that's good enough to eat!

Fill our Crayums with ketchup and mustard and get ready to draw on your food! Put an end to b-o-r-i-n-g bottles!

gift_idea.title: 110" Superior Screen
gift_idea.description: User-friendly, affordable, are portable are just a few ways to describe the Outdoor Inflatable Screen sensation sweeping the nation. Experience movies, gaming, and more on a inflatable projection movie screen in HD and 16:9 aspect ratio! Perfect entertainment for a backyard movie or camp site theatre.

gift_idea.title: Cassette Table Lamp
gift_idea.description: This Cassette Table Lamp is a tribute to cassette tapes, which kept us company all trough the 80's and became a symbol of a generation.

gift_idea.title: Handpresso Auto Espresso Maker
gift_idea.description:
This Espresso Maker provides you with a 6 bar pressure, it uses a 12v cigarette lighter and uses ESE Pods for brewing.

Water reservoir capacity: 1.79 fl.oz (53 ml)

Cycle: 2 minutes

gift_idea.title: Nike Air Max 97 Silver
gift_idea.description: The Nike Air Max 97 was released in 1997 for the first time and combined a futuristic look with avery comfortable full-length Air Unit, what got him many fans all over the world.

gift_idea.title: Illuminated Pool Table
gift_idea.description: This incredible pool table illuminates at night, it can also be converted into table hockey units.

gift_idea.title: Do Hit Chair
gift_idea.description: With the hammer provided and your own resources you shape the metal box into whatever you choose it to be. After a few minutes or hours of hard work you become the co-designer of Do hit.

gift_idea.title: Felted Wool Stones
gift_idea.description:
Renowned South African textile designer Ronel Jordaan takes her inspiration from nature, and uses felt to give free rein to her imagination. Interlocking fibers, made from 100% merino wool are being transformed into these freeform oversized "stone" floor cushions. Though they may fool the eye, they provide immediately recognizable comfort to weary torsos in search of a relaxing seat. Soft yet buoyant, the veined, smooth textured cushions can be arranged to support seat and back. Children love them. Parents love them. Guests love them, too. Hand washable in cold water. 
SMALL 12"W x 14"D x 5"H, 
MEDIUM 16"W x 20"D x 12"H, 
LARGE 31"W x 27"D x 16"H

gift_idea.title: World's Largest Coffee Cup
gift_idea.description: Sometimes one cup of coffee just isn't enough. Sometimes you just feel like you need 2 or 5 or 20. So why not make it easy on yourself and just put all of those cups into one giant mug? This coffee mug can hold up to twenty cups of coffee Though we advise against actually drinking 20 cups at once, it's nice to know you could if you wanted, right?

gift_idea.title: My Half Your Half Pillows Pillow Cases
gift_idea.description: A pair of 2 Standard pillow cases 20 x 30 customized with Your Half - My Half text and arrows. My Half arrows span about 75% of the bed.

gift_idea.title: Ceramic Letter Dish
gift_idea.description: A fun way to serve nibbles or chocolates at a wedding or party. The Ceramic Dish Letters are also perfect for giving as wedding favors, gifts or to use as a wedding centerpiece.

gift_idea.title: Underwater Scooter
gift_idea.description:
The new Bladefish underwater scooter allows You to cruise along at a speed of 2 miles per hour in depths of up to 65 feet.

Just turn your body slightly in the direction you want to go: The vehicle will immediately point in that direction – and you can circuit.

Each movement is absolutely flowing – there is no backwash of unpleasant air bubbles to obstruct your view. And there is nothing to worry about should you let it go because the propeller will stop automatically.

gift_idea.title: Bruce Lee DJ Tee
gift_idea.description: Bruce Lee V Neck in Light Grey. This graphic has the Bruce Lee Dj'ing with gold foil on the glasses, necklace and watch and is worn by many celebrities in Los Angeles. Can be worn by men or women. 50% cotton, 25% polyester, 25% rayon.

gift_idea.title: Five Finger Fillet Black Steak Knife Holder
gift_idea.description: Always have steak knives at your fingertips with this unique set from CSB Commodities. This Five Finger Fillet steak knife set comes complete with 6 stainless steel knives in an eye-catching stand. This set includes: Six 4.5-inch steak knives and a plastic stand.

gift_idea.title: Audiophile's Lacrima Speakers
gift_idea.description: These are the hand-built four-way speakers that produce the widest, most stable acoustic sweet spot of any speakers available. The cabinet's rounded, teardrop shape produces broad, horizontal sound dispersion across an entire room while eliminating the distortion created by secondary reflections in rectangular cabinets. Three tapered tubes extending from the drivers to the back of the cabinet channel dampen unwanted sound coloration and resonance, ensuring only pristine sound emanates from the speaker. Two bass drivers float on silicone O-rings, eliminating mechanical coloration, and the cochlear shaped cabinet absorbs sound and prevents reflections, resulting in pure, tight bass.

gift_idea.title: "I Could Eat A Horse" Spaghetti Measuring Tool
gift_idea.description: Who said cooking is boring? DOIY surprises us again with this funny pasta measuring tool, that helps you know exactly how much spaghetti you need for a kid, a woman, a man... or even a horse, well actually even if you feel you could eat a horse this portion is for four people!!

gift_idea.title: Portable Bluetooth Solar Sound System
gift_idea.description:
This Portable Bluetooth Solar Sound System is a sound system you can take everywhere. It is solar-powered and wireless. Bluetooth loudspeaker stores solar energy for up to 8 hours of non-stop music.

The sun supplies the energy, the sound system receives the music wirelessly – namely from any Bluetooth-enabled Smartphone, iPod, iPad, MP3 player etc. No hissing or crackling, no other interferences. With a range of up to 10m (11 yds) the speakers are ideal on the terrace or in the garden, at a picnic, on the beach, wherever you like.

gift_idea.title: Four in One Rotating Game Table
gift_idea.description: A complete game room in one compact component, this rotating table is offered exclusively by Hammacher Schlemmer and incorporates four popular tavern games in a space typically reserved for one. Less than 4' long and 3' wide, the table gives competitors the option of playing hockey, foosball, billiards, or dice football with a convenient turnstile knob that makes it easy to rotate the table and lock it into position to reveal a new game surface.

gift_idea.title: Portable Ping Pong Set
gift_idea.description:
Can't compromise with a coworker? Reliving sibling rivalry on vacation? Ping-Pong: The perfect conflict resolution. 

Put an end to the back-and-forth over a smart game, fair and square - just keep this go-anywhere set handy. A portable, retractable net, adjustable paddles and two ping-pong balls comes in a drawstring pouch for easy travel and storage. Net expands up to six feet.

gift_idea.title: The Dogbrella
gift_idea.description: This inverted bumbershoot forms a waterproof cocoon around a small dog, enabling canine and master to maintain a walking regimen in inclement weather.

gift_idea.title: Hot Hoop Radiator
gift_idea.description: Challenging the orthodoxy of traditional forms, Hot Hoop runs dazzling rings round all other radiators.

gift_idea.title: Panda Shirt
gift_idea.description: Threadless Guys Tee.

gift_idea.title: Wilson - Cast Away
gift_idea.description:
Directed by Robert Zemeckis and starring Tom Hanks; Cast Away follows a FedEx executive’s adventures as he tries to survive on a desert island after a plane crash. It also stars a volleyball called Wilson. 

This piece of merchandise is perfect for fans of the film, veteran volleyballers and anyone looking a bit lonely. He’s a great listener.

gift_idea.title: Cottage Daybed
gift_idea.description: The Kettal Cottage Daybed is a charming cabana where one can relax in comfort and enjoy the landscape of the outdoors.

gift_idea.title: Blue Light Solar Night Lamp
gift_idea.description: This globoy is a sleepy sentinel on your windowsill and it will give off a warm comforting glow if you flip him over on your nightstand when darkness falls.

gift_idea.title: Mini Ice Cream Sandwich Makers
gift_idea.description: Delightful mouthfuls of fun made with cute moulds are just the thing to round off a summer get-together, or a great way to keep kids amused in the kitchen if the weather’s not so fine. Choose your favourite biscuit, or bake your own cookie dough if you prefer, press down to cut out the top layer, scoop an ice cream filling of your choice, add the bottom layer of biscuit then simply twist the handle to pop out your dinky desserts.

gift_idea.title: Open Air Cinema
gift_idea.description:
The drive-in theatre may be a fond memory of a bygone era; however, the mystique of outdoor movies is still alive and well. 

Open Air Cinema announces a whole new way to enjoy the thrills and fun of movies under the stars with its CineBoxTM Home backyard theater system. CineBoxTM Home comes equipped with everything needed for a backyard movie night including a new patent-pending sixteen-foot inflatable movie screen, projector, powerful outdoor speakers, audio mixer, cables, and more. 

The product is perfect for "staycations" where families stay close to home and spend time together rather than suffering from high travel-related expenses. Cine BoxTM Home rips the roof off the home theater and takes it outside. The inflatable screen is easier to set up than a pup tent and when deflated, the 220-inch diagonal movie screen weighs about eight pounds and fits inside a duffle bag, which you can take anywhere. Virtually any venue can become a theater. Everyone can enjoy their favorite movies by the pool, in your backyard, or at a BBQ on the beach. Open Air Cinema manufactures its screens under the highest of standards to ensure quality, durability and ease of use. Set up is a snap. Simply use the air blower to inflate the screen, plug in the CineBoxTM Home, pop in a movie and you're all set for big-screen, backyard movie-under-the-stars action!

gift_idea.title: Adidas Santiago Watch
gift_idea.description:
With this Santiago Watch by adidas Originals you get a retro styled, fresh vintage inspired product.
-	Three hand movement
-	Brand logo on face
-	Pin and buckle fastening
-	Quartz movement

gift_idea.title: This isn't Sweat It's Sparkle
gift_idea.description: The more you sparkle (sweat), the better because it means you are working that bod of yours. Wearing this adorable super sparkly tank is going to make it even more fun because you will want to wear this sparkler out any chance you get!

gift_idea.title: Dog Hoodie
gift_idea.description:
There's nothing basic about Casual Canine Basic Hoodies! These brightly colored pet sweatshirts are comfortable, made of 100% cotton, and accessorized with the same attributes as hoodies made for humans.
Classic and comfortable hooded sweatshirts with kangaroo-style pockets on the back. Ribbed sleeves and waist ensure a snug fit. Available in a variety of colors, so customers can choose their favorites! Each is shipped in a polybag with a hanger and hangtag.

gift_idea.title: ManaTea Infuser
gift_idea.description: Usually found relaxing under the sea, now he's here to help you make tea! This delightful ManaTea Infuser is not only super cute - but super useful. Fill his tail with tea leaves & let his flippers hang over the side of your cup. Add hot water and let the brewing begin. Dishwasher safe. Soft silicone rubber. 5" tall and 2.25" wide.

gift_idea.title: LV Lord Voldemort Harry Potter Tank Top Vest
gift_idea.description: off white cotton blend, soft touch tank-top vest with LV Lord Voldemort Harry Potter Ladies. Round neck. Short sleeves. Machine wash cold with like colours, turn inside out, do not iron on graphic. Women.

gift_idea.title: Carbon Fiber Bathtub/Hammock
gift_idea.description:
Struck by the synergy between the shapes of two compelling symbols of relaxation, a hammock and a bath tub, Splinter Works were inspired to develop a piece that would provide the ultimate vehicle for total escapism.

The peaceful experience of kicking-back in a hammock has been further enhanced by combining it with the immersive comfort of soaking in a hot bath. By literally elevating the experience of bathing into a suspended sculpture the bathroom has been reinvented as a contemplative sanctuary for artful relaxation.

Designed for use in a wet room, Vessel is suspended from the walls and does not touch the floor. It is fixed with stainless steel brackets that can be covered over, or left revealed. The bath is filled using a floor standing tap and the waste water released through the base into a floor drain. A downpipe drain can also be installed if a wet room setting is not possible.

Vessel is made from carbon fibre which is utilised for its inherent strength and ability to be formed into complex curves, furthermore the weave of the fabric references the cloth of a typical hammock. Beneath the layers of carbon fibre lies a foam core, which insulates the tub, meaning the bath stays hot for considerably longer than normal.

gift_idea.title: Aqua Phone Case
gift_idea.description:
With this form-fitting waterproof case, you can safeguard your smart phones from the elements!
As well as protecting your handset 100% from water, the Aqua Phone Case also guards against sand, dust and snow. What’s more, the case’s touch-sensitive skin means that your device is still fully functional when it’s sealed away. You can take super clear underwater video footage - as long as you start recording before you dip under the waves- or lounge around the pool on your lilo, chatting to your mates on the phone, without worrying about dropping your most precious gadget.

Let’s face it, water and smart phones just don’t mix… but seeing as around 71% of the earth’s surface is made up of H2O, it’s unlikely you’re going to be able to keep them apart forever. Featuring a transparent, touch-sensitive Perspex skin framed by a rubber seal, this durable, protective holder acts as your mobile phone’s guardian angel!

gift_idea.title: Fusion Pool Dining Table
gift_idea.description: Convertible in just seconds, the Fusion table transforms a designer dining table into a high quality pool table. Created by Aramith, long-time leading manufacturer in the billiard industry, the Fusion dining table innovates by adding multi-functionality.

gift_idea.title: Pizza Scissors
gift_idea.description: With this Pizza Scissors you finally have a simple way to slice your pizza.

gift_idea.title: Ice Colour Changing Alarm Clock
gift_idea.description:
Here's a cool new way to add some colour to your routine. The Aurora Ice Colour Changing Alarm Clock has a cool clear ice finish that's clean and not at all cold to the touch!
The clear alarm clock glows a different colour each hour, making it easier to know what time it is even when you're half asleep. With 12 colours to go through, every hour has its own colour - making it perfect for everyone, even kiddies learning to tell the time.

This crystal clear colour changing clock displays both the time and date, as well as having a colour scrolling light and sound alarm.

When that alarm sounds, there are no fiddly buttons to find or switches to flip; simply touch the clock and you're alarm free!

gift_idea.title: Spiderman Cufflinks
gift_idea.description: These Spiderman cufflinks are the perfect novelty gift.

gift_idea.title: Single Handle Chrome Waterfall LED Bathroom Sink
gift_idea.description: The colour of these LED lights changes when the water temperature changes.

gift_idea.title: Unicorn Sprinkles Shaker
gift_idea.description: Decorating your cupcakes and tray bakes has never been so magical. Use this legendary creature-turn-practical receptacle to dust your sweet treats with sparkle and glitz for an instant dazzling effect. Simply fill this marvelous creature with delicious goodies and then dust any delicious treat to your hearts content. This is the perfect gift for any budding baker or cake creator. The Unicorn Sprinkler Shaker is a mythical fantasy turned into an edible reality that no one will be able to resist. Mary Berry would be proud!

gift_idea.title: Retro Slushie Beverage Station
gift_idea.description: Delight your family and friends with endless vibrant frozen slush drinks with this 1950's diner style Retro Slushie Beverage Station. Reinstate your childhood memories of colourful, mouth-watering slushy drinks on a hot summer's day!

gift_idea.title: Flower Shaped Egg Rings
gift_idea.description: Egg Ring Stainless Steel Flower Shape With Folding Handle.

gift_idea.title: Shtox Ever-Spinning Glass
gift_idea.description: A very elegant crystal glass tumbler, handmade in Germany. However this glass tumbler has a very special trick. Place it on the table, give the glass a spin, and it keep on spinning! Either empty, or with a drink in it, the underside is specially designed and hand finished. And because the glass has a spiral design, the spiral either seems to be moving up the glass or down, depending on which way you spin the glass.

gift_idea.title: Cocktail Layering Tool
gift_idea.description: With this great cocktail accessory you can create a perfectly layered cocktail at home. Full instructions are included along with great cocktail ideas. Basically you pour in the heaviest liquid (usually a syrup) then place the Rainbow tool over the top of your glass and lower the middle stem. Pour in the next liquid so that it gently cacades over the tool settling neatly on top of the first layer. Repeat until you are ready to serve. Packed in a smart gift tube.

gift_idea.title: Lizzie Fortunato Safari Bananas Clutch
gift_idea.description: This pouch style clutch bag has a light-pink grained leather back panel and a light-pink, cream, yellow and grey banana embroidery front with black bead appliqué details. The bag has a zipped top closure and a cream grosgrain lining with one zipped internal pocket and one open internal pocket. Leather, fabric. Country of origin: USA. Size and fit: Length 8.5in/22cm. Width 11in/28.5cm.

gift_idea.title: Panda Rice Mold Kit
gift_idea.description: With this lovely panda shaped rice ball mold kit and nori punch, you can make your rice ball snacks novel and adorable. Imagine that when your kids or lovers received your home-made sushi and find that so cute and mini “panda”, what a big surprise!

gift_idea.title: White Roses Shoe Wine Bottle Holder
gift_idea.description: Display your wine glamorously with this sassy wine decor! Our White Roses shoe wine bottle holder is designed with silver sequins covering the shoe and the white roses prominently placed just above the open-toe. This wine bottle holder is perfect for your next wine party or girl’s night in. Shoe wine bottle holder fits most standard-size wine bottles and measures 8 1/2” x 4” x 7 1/2”.

gift_idea.title: Porsche Design Shoe by Adidas
gift_idea.description: Excellence evolves in the men’s Porsche Design Sport Bounce:S³ running shoe. Reinvented with exclusive BOUNCE™ technology to provide the most luxurious ride, these shoes feature a car-inspired suspension system that transfers vertical impact into forward propulsion. They also have an innovative and stylish one-piece mesh upper with an allover seamless construction for chafe-free comfort and a glovelike fit.

gift_idea.title: Carrot Peeler and Curler
gift_idea.description: Say hello to your new best friend - the Karoto! While you're at it, say goodbye to the laborious peeling of vegetables because Karoto is a giant pencil sharpener shaped vegetable peeler with which you can peel carrots, courgettes, parsnips, cucumbers, those long radish things...and other similar shaped vegetables. It also allows you to sharpen & curl ribbons of your chosen veg to decorate and add a bit of fun to your salads and dishes. Karoto isn't just extremely useful but it looks funky as hell too!

gift_idea.title: Cake Pops
gift_idea.description: Anchors aweigh! Celebrate the summery pleasures of life at sea with these nautical-themed cake pops from Sweet Lauren Cakes in San Francisco. They're handcrafted by artisan bakers who roll crumbs of moist, baked-from-scratch red velvet cake with fluffy cream cheese frosting, then dip the pops in tinted white chocolate to create a delectable shell.

gift_idea.title: Blood Bath – Bath Mat
gift_idea.description: The Blood Bath mat can make your bathroom look like that in the motel in Hitchcock's "Psycho".The mat is full of red stains, which look very realistic. It is an excellent accessory for horror films freaks or those, who want to play a joke on their guests.

gift_idea.title: Eyeball Cufflinks
gift_idea.description: These cufflinks are very unusual! A fun and quirky gift guranteed to generate a stir! Ideal for those with a wicked sense of humour! They are presented in a silver coloured presentation box. A very unusual mens anniversary gift idea for that person who is difficult to buy for but definately not for the screamish! Cufflink Presentation box: Length 8cm Width 4cm Height 3cm.

gift_idea.title: Back massage T-Shirt
gift_idea.description:
It's 4-wheeled playtime for kids + a relaxing mini back massage for Daddy! 
Perfect for father-son playtime! Makes a great Father's Day gift for young dads!

gift_idea.title: Mustache Ice Cube Tray
gift_idea.description: Keep your drinks cool with this practical and fun moustache shape ice cube tray Made from flexible silicone allowing easy fill and removal of ice cubes Durable design with easy easy clean properties for everyday use Care instructions: Wash before first use.

gift_idea.title: Jeeves & Wooster Pendant Lights
gift_idea.description: Innermost Jeeves bowler hat light shade a great way to light up a room for a great talking point with friends.

gift_idea.title: Kamado Barbecue Grill, Oven and Smoker
gift_idea.description: The Kamado Professional Ceramic Charcoal Grill with Stand features superior dual-wall insulated ceramic construction that circulates charcoal heat more efficiently than other grills for faster, more even cooking. Adjustable vents manage the low heat needed for smoking chicken and the high heat required for searing filets.

gift_idea.title: Nap Pillow
gift_idea.description: Naps increase productivity and just generally make the world a better, brighter, and more bushy-tailed place. But why is sleeping on a plane an airborne nightmare? Not to worry, the OSTRICHPILLOW is here to help. Pop it on your head and put your hands in the welcoming armholes and you've got a snuggly, cocoon-like microenvironment that flies you direct to Slumberland. Yeah, so it might look a little strange to the stewardesses, but you’ve got more important things to worry about—like why you keep having that recurring dream that you’re actually a velociraptor.

gift_idea.title: Better Stuff Doormat
gift_idea.description: Better Stuff Doormat Neighbours have better stuff.

gift_idea.title: Lightning Hoodies
gift_idea.description: Quality materials and attention to detail are the pillars of this hoodies creation. From the hand selected brushed knit fleece fabric and modern tailored fit, to the rugged lock-stitch seam construction and the industry leading electrope™ lighting integration, this sweatshirt is founded on comfort, engineered for durability, and defines innovation.

gift_idea.title: Converse Canyon Duffel Bag
gift_idea.description: This large Canyon duffel bag from Converse comes in a white cotton colour way and features a contrasting red shoulder strap with adjustable metal buckles, a large main compartment with a branded metal zip pull plus large 'Converse All Star' branding printed throughout. Measures approx height 30cm, width 50cm, depth 30cm.

gift_idea.title: Porcelain Table Grill
gift_idea.description:
A simple and stylish table grill from Eva Solo designed to look good on any table.

The bowl part is made of porcelain, while the grid and the insert, which holds the glowing coals, are made from stainless steel.
Prior to being lit, the grill can be held by the steel handle. When hot, it stands securely on its table protector. After use, the bowl, insert and grid can be put in the dishwasher. And when it's not being used for barbecuing, you can use the grill's porcelain bowl without the steel insert as a salad bowl.

gift_idea.title: Bubble Cube
gift_idea.description:
Cocoon 1 is a very special place of retreat.
The innovative product magically connects aesthetics and function. Its insularity provides protection and seclusion. At the same time, its translucency enables us to let our thoughts wander whilst simultaneously allowing us to join in with life "outside.

gift_idea.title: Ziiiro Saturn Watch
gift_idea.description: Introducing the future. Saturn's unique digital display rides through time by propelling its hour and minute through black segments. The hour can be deciphered from its outer ring of 12 segments and minute from inner ring of 60 segments. This futuristic piece comes with a matte stainless steel casing and 24mm stainless steel mesh strap.

gift_idea.title: Ice Cream Sandwich Maker
gift_idea.description: Now you can turn your kitchen into an old-fashioned ice cream parlor with unique and delicious ice cream sandwiches made from scratch! The quick-cooking grill makes perfectly shaped round and rectangular cookies. Translucent ice cream sandwich molds open on both ends and have large, easy-to-grip handles. Enjoy creating different flavors and varieties - you may even use your Ice Cream Sandwich Maker grill to cook Italian pizzelles for more dessert options - It's fun for the whole family! Feel free to make a large batch of ice cream sandwiches to freeze and enjoy later; they make great party treats!

gift_idea.title: Design Bed with LCD
gift_idea.description: The bed has blinds that can enclose you for a restful free sleep, provided with finest bedding system. It also comes with a state-of-the-art sound system, reading lights, a built-in PC and full multimedia complement with game & entertainment console connected to a projector.

gift_idea.title: Boss Hugo Boss Sunglasses
gift_idea.description: The BOSS 0553/S sunglasses are a great design by BOSS Hugo Boss. Coming in a choice of colours including E70 (R6) MTGREY RT (GREY), these sunglasses for Men are a must. The 127 total width is made up from a 55 lens width and a 17 bridge width, along with an arm length of 140.

gift_idea.title: Moustache Spectacles Holder
gift_idea.description: This is for the beleaguered souls who lose far too many hours a week playing hunt the specs. Simply place said glasses on our chic - if admittedly tongue in cheek - stand, and never get caught out again.

gift_idea.title: Tablet Stand
gift_idea.description: This is the most versatile tablet stand available. The weighted base and flexible arm design allow for limitless applications.

gift_idea.title: Michael Kors Watch Hunger Stop
gift_idea.description: Michael Kors has joined forces with the United Nations World Food Programme (WFP) to fight global hunger. For every sale of the 100 Series watch, WFP will deliver 100 meals to children in need.

gift_idea.title: Digital Instant Print Camera
gift_idea.description: Introducing the newest addition to the Polaroid instant digital camera line, the Z2300 features an integrated printer with ZINK Technology, enabling users to instantly capture, edit and in less than a minute print full colour, 2x3"" prints. Along with the ability to easily upload images to any social media platform, the Z2300 combines a compact form factor with a host of fun, easy-to-use features to create the ultimate social media machine. Features: 10 MP digital camera, 3.0 bright color LCD, Compact size and usability, SD compatible for expanded memory, up to 32GB, Rechargeable lithium-ion battery, Speaker / micropohone, Prints with ZINK Zero ink. Integrated Printer Features: Snap, print, share, no computer connections needed, Smudge-proof, water-resistant, tear-resistant, photos with better picture quality and sticky back for extra fun, No Ink. No Hassles. No ink cartridges or ribbons to throw away, View and crop images on camera before printing, Option to print date, file number, Add a fun and useful border to your photo including the Classic Polaroid Border logo format, Option to print in black and white and fun shades of the Polaroid logo colours, Upload custom borders, Automatically save photos to camera or SD card for downloading, Prints under 1 minute. 10 sheets of the new premium ZINK Photo Paper. Includes: Rechargeable lithium-ion battery, AC adapter/charger, USB cable, Quick Start Guide.

gift_idea.title: Colourful Ray Ban´s
gift_idea.description: Gradient lenses: follow the latest style trends and provide a wide range of colours creating exciting and unique looks. Ray-Ban ® Simple gradient lenses are characterized by a smooth transition from a solid colour to a transparent shade of the same colour; Ray-Ban ® Bi-gradient lenses are produced with a patented technology that creates a combination of two colours resulting into a two-toned faded effect; Ray-Ban ® also offers a selection of Mirrored gradient lenses.

gift_idea.title: Water Carafe
gift_idea.description: The colourful lids add a twist to the classic water carafe. The lid is designed to keep lemon, lime or ice cubes inside the carafe. Holds 1 Liter.

gift_idea.title: Ray Ban Glowing Sunglasses
gift_idea.description:
Rock these glowing shades at a club, bar, party, concert, or rave. 

Special Edition Multicolored Rayban Wayfarer Inspired.

It's the perfect ice breaker for singles. Regardless of where you are you'll be getting tons of attention. It's definitely an eye catcher in bars, clubs, concerts, etc.

gift_idea.title: Mini Arcade Machine
gift_idea.description:
14in1 Arcade Machine Ultimate brings you something new: "HYPERSPIN" this amazing and BEST front end ever made that
put together fourteen systems that the history of video games has offered us.

gift_idea.title: Portable Mosquito Net
gift_idea.description: Perfect for camping, in hotel rooms, at home, in moderate or tropical climates: This robust 100% polyester fine mesh mosquito net protects you all-round from annoying or really dangerous insects, no matter where you are. You’ll enjoy a good night’s sleep without any disturbances.

gift_idea.title: Tube Map Mirror
gift_idea.description:
This mirror provides a wonderful focal point in any room and helps you plan your journey effectively whilst you make sure you look ready for the day ahead! The Tube Map Mirror is made from high quality 6mm glass mirror which has been produced via Suck UK's own special process. The map itself is displayed in gold and is concealed behind the glass (not printed on the front).

The mirror measures 75cm long and 52cm high and comes with steel brackets and screws for wall mounting. Thanks to the designer's clever screen printing process creates the illusion that the mirror itself is etched with the map.

gift_idea.title: Wine Waiter Outdoor Bucket
gift_idea.description:
Elegant and practical the Wine Waiter Free Standing Ice Bucket with Glasses Holder is the perfect partner for any event indoors and out. Use it in the garden when you are entertaining, take it to a concert in the park or barbecue on the beach. Chill your wine or Champagne and keep your glasses off the ground. Idea for garden parties, the Queens Coronation Celebrations, Street Parties or any other outdoor get togethers.

Wherever you use it you'll wonder how you ever managed to entertain without it.

gift_idea.title: Never Enough Tote Bag & Notebook
gift_idea.description: Noodoll is where the cheeky characters of YiYing Wang’s mind live. Its inhabitants are proud to live sustainably and ecologically whilst taking care of each other. Pleasantly, they’ve decided to take care of us, too. Ensuring we’re never bored and letting our creativity flourish, they’ve craftedterrific toys and groovy gadgets, like this fantastic tote bag and notebook, all of which are just the appropriate size to have oodles of fun with whilst also accompanying us as we go about our very serious business.

gift_idea.title: 'Man Cave' Letterpress Print
gift_idea.description: Every man has a Man Cave; whether it be the study, shed, corner of the living room and it would be useful for us to have advance warning of its whereabouts.Each print is hand inked so the result is slightly different each time. The card is 100% recycled and is very off white with some flecks.

gift_idea.title: La Bohéme Wall Art
gift_idea.description: Beautiful old school picture or this time long ago. It is out of lightly textured matte paper with resistant to sunlight. It is washable and has a fire resistant certification.

gift_idea.title: Travel HoodiePillow
gift_idea.description:
The Travel HoodiePillow is the perfect inflatable travel neck pillow for airline travel, road trips, sports teams, business traveling, lunch break napping and anyone looking for a little privacy or shut-eye no matter where they are. The Travel HoodiePillow® provides inflatable neck support and ultimate Cocoonification™ on-the-go! Is the Travel HoodiePillow® the best travel pillow ever or one of the best travel accessories? We'll let you decide...

A travel essential, our hooded travel neck pillow contains an inflatable pillow for ultimate space-saving convenience. The portable travel pillow's adjustable drawstrings can be pulled to create added eye coverage to block out the world around you. The Travel HoodiePillow® inflatable neck pillow is crafted from premium sweatshirt material. Hand wash. Line dry.

gift_idea.title: Grilled Pizza Cone Set
gift_idea.description: Pizza in a cone….yes indeed. Charcoal Companion & Pizzacraft's pizza cones are the newest way to prepare fun, personalized pizzas for the entire family.

gift_idea.title: Louis Vuitton Neverfull GM Bag
gift_idea.description: A large flexible bag in Monogram canvas suitable for business, travel or everyday use. The interior is beautifully laid out, so finding your belongings is quick and easy.

gift_idea.title: Multi Camera Harness
gift_idea.description: The Money Maker means business. High grade leather, anchored metal d-rings, and impeccably versatile design make this an essential tool for any modern day photographer. Secure your cameras and important gear where it’s most accessible and comfortable--right on you.

gift_idea.title: Night Light With Portable Glo Balls
gift_idea.description: Boon GLO nightlight with Portable Balls. Kids will beg you to turn off the lights because that's when GLO really shines. This multi-colored, interactive nightlight has removable, illuminated GLO balls that turn a night time game of catch into something extraordinary. And there's nothing electronic in them, so they don't get warm and they won't break. You can even tuck them into bed with your child. The glow fades to dark after about 30 minutes, helping them fall asleep. BONUS: 95% effective at keeping monsters away all night long.

gift_idea.title: Teddy Bear Lamp
gift_idea.description:
We cant decide whether this is cute or disturbing.
 
The thought of a fluffy, plush teddy with a lamp for a head seems quirky - if not a little frightening. Whichever way you choose to see him, he looks weirdly wonderful and will be sure to earn a second look from your guests. Let him win a place in your heart as he sits quietly on your shelf or bedside table, waiting for you to illuminate him and show him off in his best light.

gift_idea.title: Panorama iPhone Printer
gift_idea.description: Our newest Photo Cube Printer easily syncs your phone or tablet via USB or dock. Simply connect any device such as Galaxy, HTC, Android or iPhone®, iPod® or iPad® and print both standard 4" x 6" photos and stunning, extra-wide panoramic images (up to 4" x 16-1/2") via a free downloadable app. Each high-definition, 300-dpi photograph is fingerprint-, smudge-, and tear-resistant.

gift_idea.title: iRetrofone 2.0
gift_idea.description: The iRetrofone Steampunk Base is a fully-functional, stationary iPhone dock with working handset and complete compatibility with USB cable (not included) for charging and syncing. The iRetrofone Steampunk is hand-cast from a heavy-duty urethane resin creating a stable, functional work station. Designed to be compatible with ALL iPhone's (iPhone 3G, 3GS & iPhone 4G, iPhone 4S & iPhone 5), The iRetrofone base also helps eliminate concerns about radiation.

gift_idea.title: Natural Born Griller Engraved Wood Cutting Board
gift_idea.description: The perfect gift for Father's Day or for your favorite foodie or grill master.

gift_idea.title: Gumball Machine
gift_idea.description: The first gum machines appeared in New York City subways in 1888. And modern bubblegum—sweet, bright, and full of tongue-twisting stretch—was invented in 1928. But enough about way back when; this shiny Gumball Machine grants you sugary satisfaction right now. The days of one-penny candy are not a thing of the past—this retro reproduction accepts single cents or can be set to free for when you don’t feel like paying for gum out of a machine you already own.

gift_idea.title: Fish Football Training
gift_idea.description:
Given up trying to teach your old dog new tricks? 

Why not have a go with the goldfish!

gift_idea.title: Beach Lounge
gift_idea.description: Perfect place for lying in the sun, given the opportunity to even avoid it a little as wanted.

gift_idea.title: Water Dancing Speakers
gift_idea.description:
Look at your speakers, now back at these, now look at your speakers, now back at these! They aren’t these, and they never will be. Why? Because these are brilliant and like no other speakers. When the music plays the speakers explode (not literally) with jets of water illuminated by bright multi-coloured LED’s, creating a truly unique water show. The water actually bounces to the music like your very own Bellagio fountains!

Each speaker spurts 4 jets of water illuminated by multi-coloured (red, blue, green, yellow) LEDs to the beat of the music. The height of water is determined by the volume and pitch of sound. Bright enough to be seen in the daylight, however it’s in the dark when they really look special.
